article_title: Mark Begich answers questions about issues in the 2014 election for U.S. Senate
article_text: C-. Senators need to be straight with their constituents. Alaskans might not always agree with me, but I will always be honest and tell them where I stand. We need to put political differences aside so we can work together. We could get a lot more done if all senators worked together as Senator Murkowski and I do. We voted together 80% of the time this year -- more than any other bipartisan delegation in the Senate.

article_metadata.description: Alaska Dispatch News asked candidates for statewide office questions on a range of issues. Here are Democratic U.S. Sen.Mark Begich's answers.

og.description: Alaska Dispatch News asked candidates for statewide office questions on a range of issues. Here are Democratic U.S. Sen.Mark Begich's answers.
og.title: Mark Begich answers questions about issues in the 2014 election for U.S. Senate

article_summary:
We could get a lot more done if all senators worked together as Senator Murkowski and I do.
Senators need to be straight with their constituents.
We voted together 80% of the time this year -- more than any other bipartisan delegation in the Senate.
Alaskans might not always agree with me, but I will always be honest and tell them where I stand.
We need to put political differences aside so we can work together.
